CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing SkyFlow Water Index relative to Zephyr Gas Index?
SRP.A: SkyFlow Water Index is {below} Zephyr Gas Index in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Solara Power Futures relative to TerraFuel Exchange?
SRP.A: Solara Power Futures is {below} TerraFuel Exchange in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing TerraFuel Exchange relative to SkyFlow Water Index?
SRP.A: TerraFuel Exchange is {above} SkyFlow Water Index in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total natural gas prices?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Solara Power Futures}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total natural gas prices?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {TerraFuel Exchange}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is SkyFlow Water Index's minimum Natural Gas Prices in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: SkyFlow Water Index's minimum Natural Gas Prices is in {1952}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is SkyFlow Water Index's maximum Natural Gas Prices in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: SkyFlow Water Index's maximum Natural Gas Prices is in {1972}.

NC.Q: Between 1952 and 1972, was the average total Natural Gas Prices higher or lower than between 1958 and 1968?
NC.A: The average total natural gas prices between 1952 and 1972 was {lower} than between 1958 and 1968.

NC.Q: Between 1953 and 1959, was the average total Natural Gas Prices higher or lower than between 1952 and 1957?
NC.A: The average total natural gas prices between 1953 and 1959 was {higher} than between 1952 and 1957.

NC.Q: Between 1955 and 1963, was the average total Natural Gas Prices higher or lower than between 1958 and 1972?
NC.A: The average total natural gas prices between 1955 and 1963 was {lower} than between 1958 and 1972.

NC.Q: Between 1962 and 1964, was the average total Natural Gas Prices higher or lower than between 1963 and 1970?
NC.A: The average total natural gas prices between 1962 and 1964 was {lower} than between 1963 and 1970.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Solara Power Futures} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did TerraFuel Exchange and Zephyr Gas Index first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: TerraFuel Exchange and Zephyr Gas Index first exchanged leading positions in {1953}.
